document.full_text: an estimated 120,000 people protested on monday, increasing pressure on chancellor angela merkel's government to speed up the closing of germany's 17 nuclear plants.
document.title: demonstrators in germany demand end of nuclear power
lines_and_colors: an estimated 120,000 people protested on monday, increasing pressure on chancellor angela merkel's government to speed up the closing of germany's 17 nuclear plants.
